item.description:
We will be teaching all four voice parts for the song "Consider Yourself" from the musical Oliver!
It's a song that we at Sounds of Concord use to welcome our audience. In the show, the boys are singing it to Oliver Twist, to welcome him into his new home.
After the song lesson, the chorus will resume intensive preparation for our contest performance on April 10. Guests are welcome to stay on and watch the rehearsal, and maybe sing a tag with us.

group.name: Boston Area Acapella Barbershop Quartet/Chorus Singing

item.name: Learn the song "Consider Yourself" from Oliver!
